sourcesContent: import { Moon, Sun, Monitor } from 'lucide-react' import { Button } from './ui/button' import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from './ui/dropdown-menu' import { useTheme } from './ThemeProvider' export function ThemeToggle() { const { setTheme, theme } = useTheme() return ( setTheme('light')} className={theme === 'light' ? 'bg-accent' : ''} > Light setTheme('dark')} className={theme === 'dark' ? 'bg-accent' : ''} > Dark setTheme('system')} className={theme === 'system' ? 'bg-accent' : ''} > System ) }
